question:
Consider the following organizations/groups:
  1. Pacific Economic Cooperation Council (PECC)
  2. Bay of Bengal Initiative for Multi-Sectoral Technical and Economic Cooperation (BIMSTEC)
  3. Organization of the Black Sea Economic Cooperation (BSEC)
At present, India is a member country of which of the above?
explanation: The Pacific Economic Cooperation Council (PECC) is a network of member committees composed of individuals and institutions dedicated to promoting cooperation across the Asia Pacific region. PECC has 23 full member committees. India is not a member of it. Also, India is not a member of Organization of the Black Sea Economic Cooperation (BSEC).
